articles.author: Kate Gibson
articles.title: FEMA urged to add extreme heat, wildfire smoke to list of disasters - CBS News
articles.description: Heat kills more Americans than hurricanes, floods and tornadoes, yet federal aid doesn't flow as with other disasters.
articles.content:
A coalition of organizations is calling on the Federal Emergency Management Agency to add extreme heat and wildfire smoke to its list of scenarios worthy of being labeled a major disaster.
Dozens of… [+2374 chars]
